descriptionHtml:
Violet is the long lost sister of Scarlette. She has some healing spells, frost and conjuration spells. You can find her in the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.

REQUIRED MODS:
Apachii Sky Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
***Please note, you must download both the Full Version 1.5 AND the female additional hairstyles 1.3.
YOU MUST HAVE THESE TWO MODS IN ORDER TO MAKE VIOLET WORK!!!

Mods used in the screenshots to get the look: (besides Apachii)
CBBE - body AND facepack - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
Elven Dresses - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39922/?
Velvet Robes and Cloaks - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49130/?
KD Circlets redone by zzjay - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?
Ultimate Assortment by Favoredsoul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39959/?

Credits:
Apachii Sky Hair
author: Kaolinite77
